description:
This a a bridge for the Dokan library and the DiscUtils library that allows Any partition/image that discutils can open to be mounted using dokan
Built using Dokan dokan-dev.net/en and DiscUtils.codeplex.com
Currently working: Mounts ANY filesystem DiscUtils Supports. Reads files, directory browsing, Deleting, moving,Writing files (Notepad wont write but notepad++ will. Havent found the problem there yet.) (I need someone who knows more about streams!)
summary: This a a bridge for the Dokan library and the DiscUtils library that allows Any partition/image that discutils can open to be mounted using dokan
author: DokanDiscUtils
